name: Cross Wired
description:
Submitted to VR-JAM 2020 hosted by phantomunboxing, C-Through, Valem, Developed with Unity using a Oculus Quest headset in Link mode, may work for other devices.

Theme: "One Tool, Many Uses"

Game: Play Cooperatively with another player in an asymmetric environment.  

Gameplay: Playing as two robots, seeking to mine for riches using their combi drill, which is part drill part turret.  Each robot has unique skills, the PC players robot can pick up heavy objects such as the combi drill and gems whilst the VR player can tinker with the components of the combi drill, controlling how much power it uses, switching modes and fuelling it.  Together players should communicate to operate the combi drill successfully mining when new dig spots shows up and destroying monsters when they spawn. However both players have a cable attached to them, stepping on any cable will shock the player causing them to drop whatever they are carrying.  

Controls: PC player controls movement with WASD and picks up intractable s with space.

VR player moves with joysticks, and interacts with objects using the grip buttons. 

Art: Some of the art was created for this project using tilt brush - https://poly.google.com/uploads/publish/6FvacHLGPoq?pli=1
